explanation: [0-0] The video starts with a black screen.

[0-3] A man wearing black headphones, a black T-shirt, and yellow shorts walks from the middle of the screen to the left. Behind him appears a shield with the Portuguese flag on a yellow background, below which is a pattern of English letters. Then the picture transitions, and the English letters "ST" appear in the middle of the shield. The man opens his mouth excitedly, widens his eyes, and puts his hands on his waist. Then he bends his legs and squats down, with his left arm bent and continuing to maintain an excited expression.
